idea-plugin.name: Twitch Dark Theme
idea-plugin.description: Twitch brand colors inspired theme for your favorite IntelliJ IDE
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.2.4 Fix popup menu paddings and submenu offset
1.2.3 Fix Welcome Screen buttons
1.2.2 Color NewClass popup
1.2.1 Action button darker color
1.2.0 The panels, colored in gray, for less stress on the eyes. Changed the color scheme of the editor (now less colors)
1.1.5 ToolWindow button hover/active change
1.1.4 Speed search, editor theme update. Plugin icon slight change
1.1.3 Editor tabs, tool window, search everywhere color change
1.1.2 Fix version control background. Brighten up borders
1.1.1 Added welcome screen support. Color changes in plugins and lists. Changes in color scheme.
1.1.0 Changed editor color scheme
1.0.7 Changed plugin icon (again)
1.0.6 Changed plugin icon
1.0.5 Fixed change notes formatting
1.0.4 Increased since-build number
1.0.3 Added plugin icon
1.0.2 Fixed editor and UI colors
1.0.1 Adding basic color scheme (UI/Editor)
1.0 Initial release
